name: Jørn Utzon
description: Jørn Utzon was a Danish architect known for his groundbreaking design of the Sydney Opera House. His innovative approach to architecture has left a lasting legacy.

name: Zaha Hadid
description: Zaha Hadid was an Iraqi-British architect known for her fluid and futuristic designs. She was the first woman to receive the Pritzker Architecture Prize and has left an indelible mark on the architectural world.

name: Frank Gehry
description: Frank Gehry is a Canadian-American architect known for his avant-garde designs and innovative use of materials. His buildings often feature undulating forms and bold shapes.

name: Norman Foster
description: Norman Foster is a British architect known for his sleek and modern designs. His work emphasizes sustainability and efficiency, and he has received numerous awards for his contributions to architecture.
